messages.message:
Hello team,
A quick follow up to this message (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06FA6A23/p1679498476203009) - we've added tenant types to all sandboxes (based on the principle of guessing) and can be found in the Owner section of the tenant page in Admiral.
Please let me know on this thread if your sandbox's type need to be updated.
Instabase Sandbox Policy (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1cBZkqmCAFtXOaQ_jGx9EyKxwWGliuoHVEcctD1ODfk4/edit#heading=h.956c44t3xn25) will start being enforced automatically starting early next week, so please reach out as soon as possible.
@fernando can you do a dry run of what changes the sandbox policy enforcer will make, that’ll be super helpful.  That way, it won’t catch people off guard.

Main new thing coming up is the enforcement of sandbox *deletion* based on the Instabase Sandbox Policy (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1cBZkqmCAFtXOaQ_jGx9EyKxwWGliuoHVEcctD1ODfk4/edit#heading=h.956c44t3xn25)
For the first few weeks we'll do it based on a "Marked for deletion list" updated every hour @ <#C0409NDPKA5|>.
